title: Check out these WWDC 2022 inspired wallpapers for your iPhone, iPad, and Mac
content:
Yesterday, Apple finally announced WWDC 2022, which will take place the week of June 6 in an all-online format for the third year in a row. Different from the 2021 artwork that featured several Memoji, Apple is betting on a more sober experience with the Swift logo in a black-ish background. That said, this didn’t stop some Twitter users to share WWDC 2022 inspired wallpapers for you to download.

more…

The post Check out these WWDC 2022 inspired wallpapers for your iPhone, iPad, and Mac appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple finally announced when WWDC 2022 will take place. Get ready for the developers' conference with these inspired wallpapers.
